nodes.text: The Exas Jewell was a luxury train designed by Shen Kanton for the planet Tyegin. On the train's maiden voyage, the con-man Lando Calrissian posed as Kanton in order to take money from several passengers in a high-stakes card game.

The Exas Jewell appeared in "Off the Rails," a short comic written by Jeremy Barlow and illustrated by Bob Molesworth. Although its name does not appear in the story proper, it is mentioned in the script.
